bridge-type.label: Viessmann API Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge provides access to devices exposed by the Viessmann API

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: The client ID. You must obtain this from the Viessmann Developer Portal when you register the client.

parameter.name: accessServerUri
parameter.label: Access Server URI
parameter.description: URI for the OAuth access server endpoint. You should not need to change this.

parameter.name: iotServerUri
parameter.label: IoT Service Endpoint
parameter.description: URI for the Viessmann IoT service endpoint. You should not need to change this.

parameter.name: responseCapture
parameter.label: Response Capture Debug
parameter.description: Debug setting to enable recording of responses from Viessmann API
